channel.title: Weird song probably made by people on crack
channel.description: I was listening to some music and I clicked a song and this didn't sound like music I was listening to. But yet I laughed while watching this but its so stupid. Funny but stupid... http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uj0GtRI4Ulo I think this song was on a tv show?

item.title: Weird song probably made by people on crack
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:8, topic:388937”]A-well-a, bird, bird, bird, the bird is the word
A-well-a, bird, bird, bird, well, the bird is the word
A-well-a, bird, bird, bird, b-bird’s the word
A-well-a, bird, bird, bird, well, the bird is the word
A-well-a, bird, bird, b-bird’s the word
A-well-a, bird, bird, bird, b-bird’s the word
A-well-a, bird, bird, bird, well, the bird is the word
A-well-a, bird, bird, b-bird’s the word
A-well-a, don’t you know about the bird
Well, everybody knows that the bird is the word
A-well-a, bird, bird, b-bird’s the word
A-well-a[/quote]
I especially like the part when he says “Bird is the word”.
